|chip2 = |chip3 = |chip4 = |antconn = MHF4 |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax |802.11ax = 1148/2402 |802.11ac = 867 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.412~2.484/5.150~5.850 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = up to 19dBm |linuxdriv = '''[[rtw89]]''' (5.16-rc+) |windriv = '''''Win 10''' (64-bits)'' |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = Wi-Fi 6E, WPA3, MU-MIMO, HE80, Bluetooth 5.2 |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax |accessible_UART = Yes |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 10/16/2020 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |country = China |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *[[Realtek#ax]] RTL8852AE - PCIe 2.0 (WLAN)/USB 2.0 (BT)/UART :802.11abgn+ac+ax 2T2R (2x2:2), Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, BT 5.0 *[[Realtek RTL8852AE Combo Module]] (Wi-Fi 6, AX1800, 2T2R 2.4/5GHz, BT) :''802.11ax RTL8852AE Combo Module'' (NGFF 2230, PCIe/USB, MHF4) :FCC ID: [https://fcc.report/FCC-ID/TX2-RTL8852AE/ TX2-RTL8852AE] (2020-10-16) â€¢ IC ID: 6317A-RTL8852AE *{{WiFiCert|WFA111371|04/19/2021}} {{See also|Realtek reference design}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://www.embeddedworks.net/products/wlan/wlan857/ ''SparkLAN WNFT-238AX(BT)'' on '''EmbeddedWorks'''] ===Drivers=== *[https://www.station-drivers.com/index.php?option=com_remository&Itemid=352&func=fileinfo&id=4901&lang=en PCI ID: '''10ec:8852''' on ''station-drivers''] ([https://devicehunt.com/view/type/pci/vendor/10EC/device/8852 DH]){{#set:Probable Linux driver=rtw89}}
